alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 11:37PM EST until February 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following river in Kentucky... Licking River near Salyersville affecting Magoffin County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Licking River near Salyersville. * WHEN...Through early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 8.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 4 am est Saturday.
